name: Hegis' Grasp: Evil Resurrected
description: Hegis' Grasp is a story-driven, atmospheric survival horror game. Play as Henry Wood, a curious journalist investigating rumors of what is happening to the once peaceful village, Hegis. It will be up to you how this story ends, but first, you must survive the insanity of the natives within this damned place.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 Dual-Core CPU 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i7 Quad-Core CPU 2.6 GHz or equivalent AMD CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
